headline: A 13-Year-Old Suspect In a Studentâ€™s Murder  Will Remain in Custody
abstract: The teenager, accused in the death of the Barnard student, exhibited troubling behavior at a detention center, New York City lawyers said.
lead_paragraph: A Family Court judge on Thursday rejected a request from a lawyer for a 13-year-old charged in the killing of the Barnard College student Tessa Majors that the teenager be allowed to go home until his trial begins.
